assessment.name: Mid-Year Portfolio review
assessment.weight: Compliance Hurdle: Students must complete regardless of other outcomes

assessment.name: Summative Portfolio review
assessment.weight: Performance Hurdle: Students must pass regardless of other outcomes

assessment.name: Clinical Participation Assessment (CPA)
assessment.weight: Contributes to Mid-year and Summative Portfolio Review

assessment.name: Mini-Clinical Evaluation Exercise (Mini-CEX)
assessment.weight: Submit prescribed number per year to avoid showing insufficient progress in WLP

assessment.name: DOPS and COPS
assessment.weight: Submit prescribed number per year to avoid showing insufficient progress in WLP
